attributes.action: Ban China’s re-education camps and free the Uyghur Muslims
attributes.background: Put pressure on the Chinese government to ban re-education camps and release the Uyghur Muslims. This issue shouldn’t require a petition to finally be acted upon, as human being we all have equal rights. This shouldn’t be something that is happening in 2020.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300146
